title: A Little to the Left (by Secret Mode)
author: mastery51
excerpt: Free to try first 9 levels $9.99 USD unlock the rest of the game. [ATTACH] [ATTACH] [MEDIA]...
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: Free to try first 9 levels $9.99 USD unlock the rest of the game. A Little to the Left ~TRY BEFORE YOU BUY~ Try 9 puzzles from the main game, plus 3 Daily Tidy puzzles and 1 level from the Archive. A one-t… Details~TRY BEFORE YOU BUY~ Try 9 puzzles from the main game, plus 3 Daily Tidy puzzles and 1 level from the Archive. A one-time in-app purchase opens up the original A Little to the Left experience with over 100 puzzles, complete access to the Daily Tidy Delivery and seasonal puzzles in the Archive. No ads. Stay tuned for upcoming releases of two Premium DLC which, if combined, provides 132 solutions across 63 new puzzles! Sort, stack, and organize household objects into just the right spot in A Little to the Left, a tidy puzzle game with a mischievous cat who likes to shake things up! - Over 100 unique logical puzzles. - Puzzles hidden among household objects. - Multiple solutions. - A puzzle unique for you every day with The Daily Tidy Delivery. - Perfect for casual puzzle game fans and those who get a jolt of satisfaction from a well organized space. - Feel free to skip levels with the "Let It Be" option, and choose when you want to tackle certain messes. - A unique hint system. - Intuitive drag and drop controls. - A mischievous (but very cute) cat. - Funny and playful, great for all ages! TouchArcade Rating:Unrated Compatibility:HD Universal https://apps.apple.com/us/app/a-little-to-the-left/id1613352146 I mean it looks like something I’d give a go of but 9.99 fill unlock seems expensive for the kind of game it is. It’s what’s put me off buying that Unpacking game being 9.99 and people saying it takes like 2 hours to finish. This sounds like it might have more content though? My daughter is obsessed with this game on PC; just looks like tidying up to me. Hopefully she doesn’t notice that it’s come to iOS! My comment does rather smack of “grumpy old man”; didn’t really mean it quite like that! I appreciate that it’s a well thought of game and I’m sure there’s good reason for that. sebgo and squarezero like this. I can recommend the game "Satisgame". It now has 22 chapters each 20 levels which makes a total of 440 levels. To unlock a chapter you have to look at 4 advertisements to unlock them permanently. otherwise the game is ad-free. Great game https://apps.apple.com/de/app/satisgame/id1669869019 Share This Page
html:
1. Free to try first 9 levels $9.99 USD unlock the rest of the game.


    A Little to the Left

    ~TRY BEFORE YOU BUY~ Try 9 puzzles from the main game, plus 3 Daily Tidy puzzles and 1 level from the Archive. A one-t…
    Details
    ~TRY BEFORE YOU BUY~ Try 9 puzzles from the main game, plus 3 Daily Tidy puzzles and 1 level from the Archive. A one-time in-app purchase opens up the original A Little to the Left experience with over 100 puzzles, complete access to the Daily Tidy Delivery and seasonal puzzles in the Archive. No ads. Stay tuned for upcoming releases of two Premium DLC which, if combined, provides 132 solutions across 63 new puzzles! Sort, stack, and organize household objects into just the right spot in A Little to the Left, a tidy puzzle game with a mischievous cat who likes to shake things up! - Over 100 unique logical puzzles. - Puzzles hidden among household objects. - Multiple solutions. - A puzzle unique for you every day with The Daily Tidy Delivery. - Perfect for casual puzzle game fans and those who get a jolt of satisfaction from a well organized space. - Feel free to skip levels with the "Let It Be" option, and choose when you want to tackle certain messes. - A unique hint system. - Intuitive drag and drop controls. - A mischievous (but very cute) cat. - Funny and playful, great for all ages!
    TouchArcade Rating:Unrated
    Compatibility:HD Universal

    https://apps.apple.com/us/app/a-little-to-the-left/id1613352146

  2. I mean it looks like something I’d give a go of but 9.99 fill unlock seems expensive for the kind of game it is. It’s what’s put me off buying that Unpacking game being 9.99 and people saying it takes like 2 hours to finish.

    This sounds like it might have more content though?

  3. My daughter is obsessed with this game on PC; just looks like tidying up to me. Hopefully she doesn’t notice that it’s come to iOS!
  5. My comment does rather smack of “grumpy old man”; didn’t really mean it quite like that!

    I appreciate that it’s a well thought of game and I’m sure there’s good reason for that.

    sebgo and squarezero like this.
  6. I can recommend the game "Satisgame". It now has 22 chapters each 20 levels which makes a total of 440 levels. To unlock a chapter you have to look at 4 advertisements to unlock them permanently. otherwise the game is ad-free. Great game

    https://apps.apple.com/de/app/satisgame/id1669869019
